metadata.title: CVE-2024-28219 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In _imagingcms.c in Pillow before 10.3.0, a buffer overflow exists becausestrcpy is used instead of strncpy.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-28219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 10.4.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 10.4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.4.0-1').
